overview: Basenji is a deep learning framework for regulatory genomics that leverages convolutional neural networks (CNNs) to predict transcriptional regulation by learning the patterns of chromatin accessibility, histone modification, and transcription factor binding.
core_features: Utilizes convolutional neural networks (CNNs) for regulatory genomics
Predicts transcriptional regulation by learning patterns of chromatin accessibility, histone modification, and transcription factor binding
Performs genome sequence segmentation and regulatory element prediction
